page.title: 01THE AREA AROUND ROBOROUGH
page.content: Roborough is a village on the northen outskirts of Plymouth.There is an airport from which you can fly to Cornwall and the Scilly Isles and the Channel Islands.It is quite open land around Roborough because it is nearly on Dartmoor.There are three industrial estates in the Roborough area,Southway,Belliver and Estover.Belliver is mainly houses and factories but there is a small park and a shop.Southway is larger.There is a secondary school and 4 primary schools.There is a shopping precinct ,a garage and a pub.Drake's leat runs through some people's back gardens.There are several housing estates in this area called Glenholt,Belliver,Southway,Widewell and Derriford and there is also a new housing estate at Woolwell.
